question: 心得
sourceMnemonic: What does your <kanji>heart</kanji> want to <kanji>acquire</kanji> above all other things? <vocabulary>Knowledge</vocabulary>! That's why you're here isn't it? Dig deep and see that all your heart wants is more <vocabulary>information</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>understanding</vocabulary> of Japanese to be happy.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The readings for this word are both kun'yomi readings. You've learned both of these readings by now so you should be able to read this on your own.
